â€œI really enjoy the flavor of this strain. The high is very uplifting and did I mention the flavor?? OMG the lenomene is so strong and that is my favorite flavor profile (Could ya tell). The strain I recently reviewed was testing at 19.74% and it was that and some! Great for early mornings. Sharpens the mind and knocks out and bad mood you're in. Definitely a must try.â€
